[Environmental Engineering : Air Pollution]
Which one of the following statements is TRUE for Greenhouse Gas (GHG) in the atmosphere?
(A) GHG absorbs the incoming short wavelength solar radiation to the earth surface, and allows the
long wavelength radiation coming from the earth surface to pass through
